title: Baby Shark
short_plot_summary: The song tells the story of a family of sharks, singing and dancing along to a catchy tune.
explanation: A shark, representing the main subject of the song: Baby Shark and its family
A baby, symbolizing Baby Shark, the central character of the song
A family, illustrating the inclusion of Mommy Shark, Daddy Shark, Grandma Shark, and Grandpa Shark as part of the song
A party popper, representing the celebratory and lively nature of the song as people dance and sing along
A wave, depicting the ocean environment where the shark family lives
